==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|おと|め|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/woto<sub>2</sub>me<sub>1</sub>/}}: {{IPAchar|[wotwome]}} → {{IPAchar|[wotome]}} → {{IPAchar|/otome/}}

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おとめ|おと|tr1=oto|pos1=cognate with {{etyl|ojp|-}} verb {{m|ja|復つ}} ''otsu'', “to become young”|女|tr2=me|t2=girl, female}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> Contrasts with {{m|ja|男|tr=otoko||man|pos=original meaning of “boy”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おとめ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おとめ|hhira=をとめ}}

# [[daughter]]
